name: PolarBear
description:
For best experience please use Firefox/Edge or download executable desktop version (Chrome can't into Unity's Audio system :( )

Made under 8h for https://itch.io/jam/polar-bear-jam

Controlls:

Esc - exit from app

W,S,A,D / Arrows - movement

Team:

Ursanon - Code, art, design

Isabell - SFX & Art
